fullDescription.intro: Reads end of day US stock prices listed in Quandl. Use this node to fetch Unadjusted Open, Unadjusted High, Unadjusted Low, Unadjusted Close, Unadjusted Volume, Dividends, Splits, Adjusted Open, Adjusted High, Adjusted Low, Adjusted Close, and Adjusted Volume from Quandl for the 12,000+ tickers. User is required to provide information like API Key, Market, start and end dates and list of tickers to be fetched. Upon executing the node, the URL for the user specified dataset is generated and fetched from Quandl. The data is made available to the next node in the out-port table of QuandlEOD node.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)
